Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Virginity \Vir*gin"i*ty\, n. [OE. virgintee, F. virginit['e], L. virginitas.] 1. The quality or state of being a virgin; undefiled purity or chastity; maidenhood. [1913 Webster]
2. The unmarried life; celibacy. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
virginity n : the condition or quality of being a virgin
